bibl.title: P. Artemid.: The Sequence of the Fragments.
Images and Texts on the "Artemidorus Papyrus". Working Papers on P. Artemid. (St. John's College Oxford, 2008)
bibl.author: NISBET, Gideon

bibl.note: P. Artemid. (= M.-P.3 168.02; LDAB 7132). Proposes a reassessment of P. Artemid., based on a simple hypothesis: Sequences A and B (as reassembled by the editors) should be placed the other way round. The papyrus will thus run: Sequence B [1. Map (probably of a river delta); - 2. Geographical prose relating to a work by Artemidorus; - 3. Ink drawings of feet, etc.]; - Sequence A [1. Ink drawings of two bearded faces; - 2. Geographical prose (the "preface")].
